event.name: Imagica Adlabs
event.eventLongDetails: Adlabs Imagica is an amusement park located near the city of Khopoli on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway. The park is owned and operated by Adlabs Entertainment Limited.

event.name: Zumba At Delhi Academy
event.eventLongDetails: Zumba is coming up as a fun filled form of entertainment as well as exercise. Most students choose Zumba classes as a means to fitness in their daily routines. We have an official page on Zumba.com as a certified Zumba instructor and a ZIN member. Delhi Academy has trained instructors to teach Zumba and classes are held throughout the week
